description.oldValue:
Users of Microsoft Syntex can now combine PDF files into one PDF file with the Merge PDFs action in OneDrive for IOS. The Merge PDFs action lets you quickly combine multiple PDF files into a new PDF file stored in SharePoint or OneDrive.
GA date: April CY2023
description.newValue: Users of Microsoft Syntex can now combine PDF files into one PDF file with the Merge PDFs action in OneDrive for IOS. The Merge PDFs action lets you quickly combine multiple PDF files into a new PDF file stored in SharePoint or OneDrive.
